metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8856 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the serve-index package before 1.6.3 for Node.js allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a crafted file or directory name.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2015-8856` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-serve-index - 1.9.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-serve-index package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.9.1-1').
